vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὄλονθος, ὁ,
(ἡ [Refs 5th c.BC+], edible fruit of the wild fig, [Refs 8th c.BC+] (ὁ φιλόσοφος) cited in [LXX+5th c.BC+]
__2 sterile summer fruit of the cultivated fig, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__3 sterile male inflorescence of the caprifig, breeding ψῆνες, which fertilize σῦκα, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
late fig
an unripe, or unseasonable fig, such as, shaded by the foliage, does not ripen at the usual season, but hangs on the trees during winter, Rev. 6:13*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 晚熟或是夏季的無花果 (啟 6:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 晚熟或是夏季的无花果 (启 6:13)
